column4: I seem to have run into my second lockup after 1 week of uptime.  I can ping my remote server but I can't SSH to it. My only recourse is a power cycle.  How might I find out what caused the lockup after I have rebooted my server?
ping replies would tell me that the server is up and running
I'm getting an IP KVM attached within the hour.  It looks exactly like what happened last time.  1 week of uptime then locked..It's only happened after I went from 6.10 to 8.04
